ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 IS STM with Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens
Includes: Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens, Opteka 500mm f/8 High Definition Telephoto Mirror Lens for Digital SLR Cameras, Transcend 32 GB SDHC Class 10 Flash Memory Card
Two Ultra High Quality Battery Packs for Canon EOS, Opteka RC-4 Wireless Remote Control for Canon, Opteka OPT540 54" Compact Professional Photo / Video Tripod,
Opteka High Definition II UV (0) Ultra Violet Haze Multi-Coated Glass Filter, Filter Kit, Rapid Charger, HDMI Cable, Opteka Microfiber Deluxe Photo/Video Camera Gadget Bag for Digital Cameras & Camcorders
Opteka Digital Camera / Camcorder Lens Cleaning Kit, Tabletop Tripod, & LCD Screen Protectors, Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Photography in Snap DVD, 47 Street Photo Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-135mm F3.5-5.6 IS STM Deluxe Kit with Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens, Opteka 500mm f/8 High Definition Telephoto Mirror Lens, 32GB Memory Card, Spare Battery (Qty 2), Filters + More!
